Name: learning_rate_schedule
Title: Adaptive Learning Rate Schedules: Comparing different learning rate schedules for diffusion models.
Experiment: In this experiment, we compare the performance of different learning rate schedules on diffusion model performance. We use the final estimated KL as the evaluation metric.

Name: geometric_positional_encodings
Title: Geometric-Aware Positional Encodings for Low-Dimensional Diffusion Models
Experiment: Implement and compare encoding schemes specifically designed for 2D geometric data: 1) Polar coordinate encoding (radius/angle), 2) Distance-to-cluster-centers encoding (using k-means on training data), 3) Original sinusoidal (baseline). Train each variant on all datasets, comparing: training convergence, sample quality (KL divergence), and mode coverage. Requires modifying only the embedding class while keeping network architecture fixed.
